name: Bob's Balloons (feloeffel)
description:
Welcome to Bob's Balloons!

In the game, you controll a balloon. You dodge birds and collect coins along the way. With those coins, you can buy many different upgrades for your balloon. These are:

- More Money: Increases the amount of money that spawns.

- More Helium: Gives you a helium boost. Activate it with the left mouse button.

- Toughness: Increases HP

- Nail: Places a nail on top of you. Use it to damage birds.

- Stronger Helium: Increases the boost of your helium.

- Wings: Increases your general speed.

- Missile Launcher: Kills birds with missiles.

- Jet Engine: Gives you a massive boost. Activate with the right mouse button.

I made this game for the ZenoJam 6. There was a time frame of 1 week, but i started later so i only had about 1.5 days to make this game.

Have fun with the game!
